appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: Prettify your Facebook chat. Bigger size, more animation, more... nice :-)
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

please_share_me.message: Please share this extension at least once to unlock the advanced settings! Thank you! :)

share.message: Yes. I want to unlock the Advanced Settings

click_for_install.message: Click here to get Pretty FaceLook Chat---> https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ihamlfilbdodiokndlfmmlpjlnopaobi

confirm_delete_img.message: Are you sure to want to delete this icon from favorites?

confirm_insert_emote.message: Do you want to insert this emote in your favorites?

send_stats_advise.message: You can send me your Pretty FaceLook Chat configuration. That's only for developing purposes (so I can see the most used configurations). Do you want help me? :)
